DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy simultaneous , trans-conjunctival , 25-Gauge vitrectomy phacoemulsification intraocular lens implant patient metamorphopsia visual impairment due idiopathic epiretinal membrane cataract . All 30 patient recruited underwent complete ocular examination , visual acuity measurement ETDRS , metamorphopsia assessment M-Charts Metamorphometry® foveal thickness evaluation sd-OCT preoperatively , 30 , 90 , 180 day postoperatively .
DOC.brief_title: Mid-term Evaluation Metamorphopsia Epiretinal Membrane Surgery
DOC.criteria: age > 55 year visual acuity ≤ 20/40 idiopathic epiretinal membrane cataract Amsler test positive metamorphopsia . previous ocular intervention ocular disease .
